name: Nuwa
temple_description:
Nuwa was one of the originators of the Chinese civilization, and the Goddess of Blessings. She sculpted humans from clay, created human society, and established the marriage system.
Later, when the sky collapsed and the earth sank, Nuwa melted the Five-color stone to mend the sky. Thereafter, she was known as the Mother of Earth, and was a Goddess that was worshipped widely by mankind for millennia.

active_skills.name: Strike of Nuwa
active_skills.effect: If enemy HP < 50%, damage is doubled

active_skills.name: Sky-mending Colors
active_skills.effect: If ally HP < 50%, healing is doubled
